use.flag: Name the generated Ruby Gem in a proper manner to be used for a snapshot ebuild. The format used is 9998_pre followed by the SVN checked out revision number.
Add dependency over dev-ruby/tzinfo to enable the "time" plugin for rbot. If the USE flag is disabled the plugin is also disabled by default.
Use aspell instead of ispell in the "spell" plugin for rbot. The vanilla plugin uses ispell, but enabling this flag makes it use the ispell interface for aspell instead.
